UserSettingsForm.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address (must contain @)
UserSettingsForm.value0: The value must be at least 0
UserSettingsForm.value3: The value must be no more than 3 numbers
UserSettingsForm.amountWater: Amount of water should be a number
UserSettingsForm.activTime: Active time must be a number
UserSettingsForm.value1440: The value must be no more than 1440 minutes
UserSettingsForm.gender: Gender must be either Woman or Man
UserSettingsForm.starText: V is the volume of the water norm in liters per day, M is your body weight, T is the time of active sports, or another type of activity commensurate in terms of loads (in the absence of these, you must set 0)
UserSettingsForm.TheTimeSportsLabel: The time of active participation in sports:
UserSettingsForm.requiredWater: The required amount of water in liters per day:
UserSettingsForm.writeDownLabel: Write down how much water you will drink:

errors.water500: The amount of water must be less than 5000 ml
